benchmark_details.name: GDGB (Generative DyTAG Benchmark)
benchmark_details.overview: GDGB comprises eight meticulously curated DyTAG datasets with high-quality textual features for nodes and edges, enabling rigorous evaluation of DyTAG generation tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a foundational resource for advancing generative DyTAG research and evaluating DyTAG generation models.

data.source: Eight meticulously curated DyTAG datasets from various domains.
data.annotation: Curated and processed by the authors to ensure high-quality textual attributes.

methods: LLM-based multi-agent framework for generative tasks
metrics: Textual Quality metrics based on LLM evaluation
methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated according to the definitions provided for graph structural and textual assessments.
methodology.interpretation: Lower Degree/Spectra MMD values indicate better preservation of structural fidelity, while higher textual quality scores reflect better attribute generation.
methodology.baseline_results: Comparative results against existing models such as VRDAG and DG-Gen.
methodology.validation: Experimental results demonstrate the efficacy of GDGB in evaluating DyTAG generation.

targeted_risks.harm: Improper use of generated DyTAGs may risk generating misleading information or amplifying biases.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Data is under various licenses including CC BY 4.0 and CC BY-SA.
